summary: Dan and Phil
body:
Dan and Phil

I am so happy that Dan and Phil are both doing what they need to right now, whether that is sometimes posting or not at all.

I hope that they are both doing okay, but I get the feeling that something has changed. I don’t know if it’s just them taking steps in different dorections for their careers or more personal. Like if they are no longer living together and haven’t told us yet.

I don’t know. I might just be missing them putting out content together. It also might be the lack of Easter baking video. Whatever it is I hope that everything is okay for both of them.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Should have seen it coming that the mention of them buying a house would again increase the forever home hype in phandom....
question: Should have seen it coming that the mention of them buying a house would again increase the forever home hype in phandom. Because there’s just nothing more romantic than buying a house to renovate it and sell it for profit, that’s some totally married shit.
answer: Honestly, phannies just heard “buy a house” and jumped to every possible conclusion. When he literally flat out said “to flip it and sell it.” And not “to move into it and adopt a child”

reblog.comment: Honestly, phannies just heard “buy a house” and jumped to every possible conclusion. When he literally flat out said “to flip it and sell it.” And not “to move into it and adopt a child”

trail.content_raw: Honestly, phannies just heard “buy a house” and jumped to every possible conclusion. When he literally flat out said “to flip it and sell it.” And not “to move into it and adopt a child”

tags: this is cheesy af but im having a lot kf feelings
summary: WE BOUGHT A HAUNTED HOUSE (not clickbait)
body:
WE BOUGHT A HAUNTED HOUSE (not clickbait)

A hc copied over from my Twitter thread

The video starts with them sat outside a la j&j and we think it’s domestic content but nope it’s a trailer for their new YouTube Red show The Amazing House Is Not On Fire in which dnp attempt to renovate a home without professional help

Its 8 episodes, each of them full of crazy hijinks, diy disasters and banter over decorating choices. Phil sneaks in plants and colour and Dan wants everything to be Aesthetic.

They don’t do everything right, but its hilarious to watch.They talk about it as a family home and designated which of the bedroom will be for the kids of the family they eventually sell it to

The garden is perfect for a dog, the dining room for entertaining and board game nights

Phil looks excited, Dan looks wistful

As the show draws to a close the house is decorated in what can only be described as a tasteful, grownup amalgamation if their two styles. There are some DIY bits that didn’t quite go to plan, but it’s sound, stable, safe

In the final episode we get a run down of viewings and offers, a funny estate agent is brought in to value it and give potential owners the spiel about its origin and the wonderful new features it has

The floor to ceiling windows, fireplaces, a thriving garden with a koi pond

In the last few minutes of the show, dnp reject a low offer on the house and the tension builds

Will Dan and Phil sell the house they’ve spent 7 episodes working on?

As the final few minutes draw to a close theres a cut, the dramatic music swells and it’s revealed that they’ve decided not to sell it

They put too much of themselves into the project, and really they made it with themselves in mind and they can’t bare to part with it

The final shot is just the two of them. Standing at the bottom of the driveway. Dan has a set of keys in his hand and he turns to Phil

“Hey Phil,” he says

“Yeah?”

“Let’s go home.”

summary: phil: yeah so me and dan were gonna buy a house and fix it up and sell it and do a series about it me: so you mean to tell me......
body:
phil: yeah so me and dan were gonna buy a house and fix it up and sell it and do a series about it

me: so you mean to tell me… you would have been… the property brothers of youtube… AND YOU HAVE THE AUDACITY TO TELL ME NOW????? IN 2019???? WHAT??? THE??? FUCK????

phil: yeah so me and dan were gonna buy a house and fix it up and sell it and do a series about it

me: so you mean to tell me… you would have been… the property brothers of youtube… AND YOU HAVE THE AUDACITY TO TELL ME NOW????? IN 2019???? WHAT??? THE??? FUCK????

trail.content_raw:
phil: yeah so me and dan were gonna buy a house and fix it up and sell it and do a series about it

me: so you mean to tell me… you would have been… the property brothers of youtube… AND YOU HAVE THE AUDACITY TO TELL ME NOW????? IN 2019???? WHAT??? THE??? FUCK????
